altTitles.en: I'm in Love With the Older Girl Next Door
I Love The Older Girl Next Door.

altTitles.pt-br: Eu amo a garota mais velha da casa ao lado.

description.en: There's this beautiful, bubbly, film-loving girl who's three years older than me: her name's Shia, and she lives right next door! I'm madly in love with her, and I needed some way to see her! I settled on asking her for movie recommendations, and now I get to meet her every Wednesday! I want to know more about her, and tell her how I feel... but I just can't get the message across! Enjoy this lopsided rom-com brought to you by the author of "The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses" and "Paper Braver", Koume Fujichika!
description.pt-br:
**Minha Vizinha Cinéfila**

Tem essa garota linda, super animada e apaixonada por filmes que mora bem ao lado: o nome dela é Shia, e ela é três anos mais velha que eu! Sou completamente apaixonado por ela, e precisava de um jeito de vê-la! Decidi pedir recomendações de filmes, e agora a encontro toda quarta-feira! Quero saber mais sobre ela e contar o que sinto... mas simplesmente não consigo me expressar! Curta essa comédia romântica desequilibrada do mesmo autor de "A Garota de Quem Gosto Esqueceu os Óculos" e "Paper Braver".

altTitles.ja: 夢と恋ではつり合わない

altTitles.id: Cinta dan Impian Itu Tidak Bisa Digabung

description.en: Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.
description.id: Kurata Hikaru jatuh cinta pada pandangan pertama dengan teman sekelasnya Kira Kairi. Sekarang, dia jadi terlalu gila cinta dan tidak bisa konsentrasi dengan pelajaran. Jadi, dia berencana meminta Kairi untuk menolak cintanya agar dia bisa kembali fokus belajar lagi.

title.en: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin

altTitles.en: The Regressed Son of a Duke Is an Assassin
The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

altTitles.es: El asesino que retornó como el hijo del Duque
El pibe que retorna como el hijo menor

altTitles.es-la: La venganza del asesino de la espada demoniaca

altTitles.th: ลูกชายคนเล็กของดยุกคือมือสังหาร

altTitles.ja: 回帰した公爵家の末息子は暗殺者

description.en:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!

altTitles.fr: Le vœu n'est pas le mien
La promesse n'est pas le mien

description.en:
"Kill me, as you promised." 

When her twin sister Leyla, the Holy Maiden, suddenly disappears one day, the ordinary Elena finds herself having to marry Crown Prince Kyle, a man infamous for his ruthlessness, in her stead. After a dreadful marriage ceremony, Kyle demands that a certain promise be fulfilled, to Elena’s confusion.
description.id:
"Bunuh aku, seperti yang telah kau janjikan."

Ketika saudara kembarnya, Leyla, sang Gadis Suci, tiba-tiba menghilang pada suatu hari, Elena yang biasa-biasa saja mendapati dirinya harus menikah dengan Putra Mahkota Kyle, seorang pria yang terkenal karena kekejamannya, sebagai penggantinya. Setelah upacara pernikahan yang mengerikan, Kyle menuntut sebuah janji yang harus dipenuhi, yang membuat Elena bingung.
description.ko:
성녀와 용의 결합으로 세워진 나라 랜바이어 제국.

쌍둥이 성녀로 태어났으나 언니인 레일라와 달리 아무런 능력도 지니지 못한 엘레나는, 결혼식 직전 갑자기 사라진 언니 대신 용의 후예로 알려진 황태자 카일과 결혼하게 된다.

가짜라는 걸 들킬지도 모른다는 두려움 속에 결혼을 마친 엘레나에게, 카일은 뜻밖의 말을 내뱉는다.

"8년 전 그대가 내게 한 약속을 잊은 건 아니겠지, 레일라."
"약속대로, 나를 죽여 줘."

자기를 죽여달라는 카일의 말에, 엘레나는 큰 혼란에 빠지는데…

altTitles.en: I Have an Apocalyptic Underground City

description.en:
A Female President? Then come help me manage the shelter. A Female Special Forces Soldier? Then come and be the captain of the guards.   
At the end of the world, titles like CEOs, beautiful women, secretaries, electricians, programmers and all other professions are all no longer useful. Don't be afraid to come to my underground system shelter- as long as you are talented people and human beings!

altTitles.ja: 百瀬アキラの初恋破綻中。

altTitles.en: Momose Akira's First Love Is Coming Apart.

altTitles.fr: Les difficultés du premier amour de Momose Akira.

altTitles.pt-br: O Primeiro Amor de Momose Akira em Ruínas

altTitles.ru: Первая любовь Акиры Момосе терпит крах.

altTitles.es: El primer amor de Momose Akira se derrumba.

altTitles.vi: Mối Tình Đầu Của Akira Momose Đang Trên Bờ Vực Đổ Vỡ
Mối tình đầu đầy trắc trở của Momose Akira

description.en: Kugayama Hajime, a boy living in the countryside, comes back to his old classmate Momose Akira, whom he used to admire. Just as he is about to watch her from afar and enjoy his sweet and sour youth, Akira makes an unexpected approach. And there was a "fate" that was more than he could have imagined.
description.es:
Kugayama Hajime, un chico que vive en el campo, se reencuentra con su antigua compañera de clase Momose Akira, a la que solía admirar.

Justo cuando está a punto de observarla desde lejos y disfrutar de su agridulce juventud, Akira se acerca de forma inesperada.

Y el "destino" es mucho más de lo que él pudo haberse imaginado.
description.fr: Kugayama Hajime, un garçon vivant à la campagne, revient vers son ancien camarade de classe Momose Akira, qu'il avait l'habitude d'admirer.Alors qu'il s'apprête à la regarder de loin et à profiter de sa jeunesse aigre-douce, Akira fait une approche inattendue.Et il y a eu un « destin » qui a été plus que ce qu'il aurait pu imaginer.
description.ja: ド田舎に暮らす少年・久我山はじめのもとに帰ってきた、かつての憧れの同級生・百瀬アキラ。彼女を遠くから眺めて、甘酸っぱい青春を謳歌しよう…と思っていた矢先に、アキラからまさかのアプローチが。そしてそこには、想像以上の”運命”が拡がってました。2人の様子を、どうぞあったかく見守ってください。
description.pl: Kugayama Hajime, chłopiec mieszkający na wsi, spotyka swoją dawną koleżankę z klasy, Momose Akiry, którą podziwiał. Gdy tylko zamierza obserwować ją z daleka i cieszyć się swoją słodko-gorzką młodością, Akira niespodziewanie zbliża się do niego. A za tym kryło się „przeznaczenie”, którego nie mógł sobie nawet wyobrazić.
description.ru: Жизнь Хадзимэ Кугаямы, мальчишки из глухой деревушки, круто меняется, когда в его жизнь возвращается бывшая одноклассница и когда-то недосягаемая мечта — Акира Момосэ. Он планировал просто наблюдать за ней издалека и наслаждаться воспоминаниями о своей юности... Но неожиданно Акира делает первый шаг навстречу. И вот тут начинается нечто гораздо большее, чем он мог себе представить. Следите за их историей и согревайте свои сердца вместе с ними.
description.tr: Taşrada yaşayan bir çocuk olan Kugayama Hajime’nin, eskiden hayranlık duyduğu sınıf arkadaşı Momose Akira geri döner. Tam onu uzaktan izleyip tatlı ekşi gençliğinin tadını çıkarmak üzereyken, Akira beklenmedik bir yaklaşımda bulunur. Ve hayal edebileceğinden de öte bir “kader” ile karşılaşır.
description.pt-br: Kugayama Hajime é um jovem que vive no interior. Sua vida muda quando Momose Akira, uma antiga colega de escola por quem ele sempre foi apaixonado, retorna à cidade. Hajime planejava admirá-la de longe, saboreando um romance juvenil agridoce. Mas, para sua surpresa, Akira toma a iniciativa de se aproximar. O que se desenrola a partir daí é um destino mais surpreendente do que ele jamais poderia ter imaginado.

description.en: After I isekai'd as the female villain of an otome game, I just wanted to avoid the death ending and live a peaceful life. But why are the male lead and female lead fighting over me?

2nd-year high school student Rino Sakuragi has been in love with Ren Kiritani, a member of her friends-circle since junior high. Rino, who cannot love either her character nor body, is incredibly shy towards the popular Kiritani.  
  
*Being friends suits me just fine. After all, I don't want to be hated once he gets to know the real me.*  
  
Even though she's resigned herself to that, she cannot help but stay in love with Kiritani as he keeps on dropping suggestive lines like, "Cute." or "What do you think about me?"  
  
*I want the person I love to really get to know the real me. But because it's the person I love, I need more courage!!*  
  
1/100 000, a story about a destiny between the lines of cruelty and joy by the master of pure love romance Kaho Miyasaka.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.vi: Dã ngoại nơi mặt sau của thế giới

description.en: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
description.ja: ネット上で実話怪談として語られる存在が出現する、この現実と隣り合わせで謎だらけの<裏世界>。研究とお金稼ぎ、そして大切な人を捜すため、鳥子と空魚は非日常へと足を踏み入れる。女子ふたり怪異探検サバイバル!!
description.ru: Сюжет разворачивается в современном мире, но в нем существуют двери, которые пропускают людей "на другую сторону", где оживают городские легенды и странные истории из Интернета. Студентка колледжа Сораво Камикоши находит одну из таких дверей и идет исследовать Потусторонье. Она почти погибает, когда ее спасает Торико Нишина. Торико - загадочная девушка, которая умело обращается с ружьем и кого-то ищет в Потусторонье. Вместе они начинают исследовать мир за дверями.

description.en:
[Afternoon Shiki Award 2022 Spring Shiki Award]
In a 19th-century Irish orphanage, children are succumbing one after another to a deadly epidemic. Realizing her own time is near, Coco flees with nowhere to go. On her escape, she is taken in by Jack-o’-Lantern, a devil from folklore passed down through myth.

altTitles.zh: 网游：神级刺客，我即是暗影

description.en: In a world where people sleep and enter the realm abandoned by God, Qin Feng, who had sacrificed everything for his sister, is betrayed by her. However, fate grants him a second chance, sending him back nine years before the abandoned world appears. This time, Qin Feng chooses to abandon his sister and focus on becoming the strongest.

altTitles.en: The Reason We Fall in Love

altTitles.vi: Lý do chúng ta yêu nhau

description.en:
Aoi's superior at work is a man of few words and inscrutable thoughts, but he made her heart flutter with his sudden smile and thoughtfulness. Kei finally met someone at work whose large physique is exactly her type, and ever since, she's wondered what it would be like to touch him... or hug him...! She can't stop her mind from fantasizing about it! A collection of sweet office romances that will inevitably tug at one's heartstrings!

---
*Note: In addition, a Taisho-era love story is included along with the main story!*

altTitles.en: [Benimaru x Freeman | The King of Fighters doujinshi ]

description.en: Benimaru's visit to Southtown is really boring... until he founds a nearly dead known serial killer.
description.fr: Le célèbre Top modèle Bénimaru est en visite à Southtown. Son séjour y est d'un ennui mortel jusqu'à ce qu'il se trouve nez-à-nez avec le corps du tueur en série dont tous les médias parlent... Mais est-il vraiment mort ? Cette découverte pimentera-t-elle son séjour ? Voilà une rencontre qui ne va, assurément pas, manquer de mordant !Doujinshi du couple Benimaru et Freeman du jeu "The King of Fighters" (pas besoin de connaître pour apprécier ce Yaoi !!)

altTitles.ja: 神無き世界のカミサマ活動

altTitles.en: Working for God in a Godless World

altTitles.zh-hk: 無神世界中的神明活動

altTitles.ru: Деятельность Бога в мире без богов

altTitles.es-la: Деятельность Бога в мире без богов

description.en: Yukito, the son of a questionable cult leader, lost his life due to the cult's ridiculous training practices. Now to his surprise, he was reincarnated into another world! It was an ideal world for him without the concept of "God" or "religion" BUT...!
description.es:
El hijo del fundador de un sospechoso culto, Yukito, pierde la vida por culpa del insensato entrenamiento del culto, pero para su sorpresa, ¡se reencarna en otro mundo!
Era un mundo ideal para él, donde no existía el concepto de "Dios" o "religión"... ¡pero!

Comienza la aventura de una singular "reencarnación en otro mundo" que crea una "religión" en un mundo sin Dios.
description.id:
Yukito, putra seorang pemimpin sekte yang dipertanyakan, kehilangan nyawanya karena praktik pelatihan sekte yang konyol. Sekarang yang mengejutkannya, dia bereinkarnasi ke dunia lain!
Itu adalah dunia yang ideal baginya tanpa konsep "Tuhan" atau "agama" TAPI...!

Petualangan unik "bereinkarnasi di dunia lain" dimulai: menciptakan "agama" di dunia tanpa Tuhan?!
description.ja:
怪しげなカルト宗教の教祖の息子・征人は、教団の無茶な修行で命を落とした――はずが、なんと流行りの異世界転生！
そこは「神」や「宗教」の概念のない、征人にとっては理想の世界だった…が!?
神無き世界で「宗教」を作る異色の“異世界転生”譚、開幕!!
description.ru: Отец Юкито — лидер религиозной секты, который совершил обряд над своим сыном под названием «церемония рождения». Всё ради нового лидера религиозной секты, Юкито! Но что-то пошло не так, и в конце-концов наш герой перерождается в другом мире, где нет таких понятий как: Бог и религия, — а порнографические книги сродни детским каракулям. По мере событий Юкито понимает, что на самом деле в этом мире людскую жизнь и смерть решает империя...
description.es-la: Yukito, el hijo de un sospechoso líder de una secta, pierde la vida durante el peligroso rito de la secta y reencarna en otro mundo. Allí, es salvado por los habitantes de una remota aldea y vive felizmente con ellos. Sin embargo, la aldea es un lugar para aquellos que han sido calificados como "anormales" por el Estado Imperial. Los "anormales" son aquellos que tienen "miedo a la muerte". La gente del Reino Imperial carecía del sentido del "miedo a la muerte". Finalmente, los "anormales" iban a ser ejecutados bajo el sistema de "Condena". Yukito intenta desesperadamente salvar a los habitantes de la aldea, pero es incapaz de hacerlo. En ese momento, "Mitama", el dios del culto del que formaba parte Yukito, es convocado a este otro mundo... ¿Será capaz Yukito de sobrevivir en este otro mundo?
description.pt-br: Yukito, filho de um líder de culto questionável, perdeu a vida devido às práticas ridículas de treinamento do culto. Agora, para sua surpresa, ele reencarnou em outro mundo! Era um mundo ideal para ele sem o conceito de "Deus" ou "religião" MAS...! Uma aventura única de "reencarnação em outro mundo" começa: criar uma "religião" em um mundo sem Deus?!

altTitles.vi: Lại gặp nhau ở ban công rồi

altTitles.th: วันนี้ที่ระเบียง

description.en: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
description.ja: フリーのエディトリアルデザイナー・土岐田旬は、仕事に追われ部屋に籠りっぱなしの毎日。癒やしを求めてベランダガーデニングにハマるように。そんなある日、隣にちょっと変わった天然系の女性が引っ越してきた。ふとした出来事から、お互いの顔も知らぬままベランダの隔壁越しに話をするようになる二人。実は隣の女性は新進俳優・成海游なのだが……。ベランダとグリーンが繋ぐ隔壁越しの二人は？
description.ru:
Фрилансер дизайнер-редактор Сюн Токита настолько занят своей работой, что целыми днями сидит взаперти в своей квартире. В поисках отдыха он пристрастился к балконному садоводству. Однажды по соседству с ним поселяется необычная женщина природной красоты. Они начинают разговаривать через стенку балкона, не зная друг друга в лицо. На самом деле соседка — восходящая актриса Ю Наруми...
Балкон и зелень объединяют их через перегородку.
description.uk: Дизайнер-фрілансер любить відпочивати від роботи, займаючись садівництвом на своєму балконі. Там він починає розмовляти зі своєю новою сусідкою через стіну, не знаючи її в обличчя.

description.en: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.

Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)

altTitles.ja: 杖と剣のウィストリア

altTitles.vi: Bản Hùng ca Kiếm và Pháp Trượng

description.en: The new, magical dungeon-adventure fantasy series from the author of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Seeking to fulfill a promise to a childhood friend, Will Serfort enters Regarden Magical Academy with the goal of making it to the top of the magical world. There’s just one problem: he can’t use magic! Will his sword skills be the key to unlocking his true potential?
description.pt-br: A nova série de fantasia mágica e de aventura em masmorras do autor de "É Errado Tentar Pegar Garotas em um Calabouço?" segue a jornada de Will Serfort. Buscando cumprir uma promessa feita a uma amiga de infância, Will ingressa na Academia Mágica de Regarden com o objetivo de alcançar o topo do mundo mágico. Mas há um problema: ele não pode usar magia! Serão suas habilidades com a espada a chave para desbloquear seu verdadeiro potencial?

title.en: Zense Reitetsu Ouji no Uma deshita - Hito ni Natte mo Anata wo Aishite Ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 前世冷徹王子の馬でした～人になっても貴方を愛していいですか？～

altTitles.ja-ro: Zense Reitetsu Ouji no Uma deshita

altTitles.en: Even After My Reincarnation, I Will Still Love My Prince
I was the cold-hearted prince’s horse in my previous life ~Can I love you even after becoming human?~

description.en:
When I woke up, I, a horse, had the body of a human!? I was Lukania, the beloved horse of the lonely second prince, Ladius. However, I lost my life in an attack aimed at Ladius.

"Until the day of brightness, guide him from the brink of despair—,” given power by a goddess and reborn as a human, Lukania heads toward Ladius. He rejects the kindness around him and believes that Luccanya, who disappeared, is still alive, and continues searching. Amidst the darkness of loneliness.

"I'll make you smile,” Luccanya decides to hide her past as a horse and vows to rescue Ladius from his loneliness within her limited time.

altTitles.ja: ラジエーションハウス

description.en: A new milestone in medical drama begins! A medical diagnosis mystery manga depicting the other side of medical care, the radiology department. Iori Igarashi is a talented radiology technician who has patiently waited for his chance to work with An Amakasu, his childhood friend. After being hired at her family's hospital, he is determined to fulfill a promise that he made with An when they were younger. Unfortunately, having been out of touch for years, she doesn't recognize him and it doesn't help that she also isn't a fan of the way he performs his duties. As all sorts of cases come into the department, she must acknowledge his skills and learn to work together so that patients can receive the best treatment possible. While the two of them adapt to each other, will An recognize her childhood friend, who has been working with her all this time?
description.es-la: ¡Resulta que no solo el médico general diagnostica nuestras enfermedades! Hay médicos radiógrafos que investigan las causas y revelan las lesiones mediante rayos X o tomografía computarizada. Por no hablar de los radiólogos, que interpretan los escáneres y hacen los diagnósticos. Este 'diagnóstico de imagen' forma la base de la medicina moderna. Desde un lado del hospital que antes no se veía, donde los expertos combaten las enfermedades y las lesiones, te traemos 'Radiation House'. ¡Comienza un nuevo hito en el drama médico!

altTitles.ja: きみは四葉のクローバー

altTitles.en: You are a Four Leaf Clover

description.en: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
description.ja: かつての人気者で、今は過激ないじめを受ける宇一。そんな彼の前に突然現れた初恋の相手・よつは。可愛く健気な彼女の目的とは一体…!?
description.vi: Câu chuyện romcom nhẹ nhàng về hành trình chữa lành trái tim đã tan vỡ của main
description.zh: 某天，曾很有人气的宇一的生活陡然一变。 以往光芒四射的日子被用抹布也无法擦去的黑暗所笼罩。 这时，熟悉宇一过去的初恋—— 四叶突然出现在了他的面前。 她的目的究竟是…！？

description.en:
*NOTE: This manga contains scenes that may disturbing or triggering. Reader discretion advised!*
___
Maid Refreshment "Comet Bug" stands quietly amidst the bustle of the city. This is a place where both master and lady can return anytime. It is a place where there are "maids" who will gently and calmly accompany the tired hearts of the customers. There, Pero, a new maid, is about to receive her first customer. Pero desperately wants to heal him from his deep wounds, even if only for a moment.
description.ja: 街の喧騒のなかにひっそりと佇むメイドリフレ「彗星蟲」。ここはご主人様もお嬢様もいつでも帰れる場所。疲れた心に穏やかに、優しく寄り添ってくれる"メイド"がいる場所。そこで新人メイドのペロは初めてのお客様を迎えようとしていた。深い傷を抱えた彼を、ひと時でも癒してあげたいとペロは必死になり――。

altTitles.es: La Leyenda de los Héroes de la Galaxia (Fujisaki Ryu)

altTitles.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (Fujisaki Ryu)

description.en:
New adaptation of the novel.  
  
The story is staged in the distant future within our own Milky Way Galaxy, approximately in the late 36th century. A portion of the galaxy is filled with terraformed worlds inhabited by interstellar traveling human beings. For 150 years two mighty space powers have intermittently warred with each other: the Galactic Empire and the Free Planets Alliance. Within the Galactic Empire, based on mid 19th century Prussia, an ambitious military genius, Reinhard von Müsel, later conferred Reinhard von Lohengramm, is rising to power. He is driven by the desire to free his sister Annerose, who was taken by the Kaiser as a concubine. Later, he wants not only to end the corrupt Goldenbaum dynasty but also to defeat the Free Planets Alliance and to unify the whole galaxy under his rule.  
  
In the Free Planets Alliance Star Fleet is another genius, Yang Wen Li. He originally aspired to become a historian through a military academy, and joined the tactical division only out of need for tuition money. He was rapidly promoted to an admiral because he demonstrated excellence in military strategy in a number of decisive battles and conflicts. He becomes the archrival of Reinhard, though they highly respect one another. Unlike Reinhard he is better known for his underdog victories and accomplishments in overcoming seemingly impossible odds and mitigating casualties and damages due to military operations.  
As a historian, Yang often predicts the motives behind his enemies and narrates the rich history of his world and comments on it. One of his famous quotes is: "There are few wars between good and evil; most are between one good and another good."  
  


---
description.ru:
Новая экранизация романа.  
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

description.en:
Shinonome Yuuya, a failure at the prestigious Yuunagi Academy.
Hitsugi Akari, the top student of the year, is also a loner like him.
Despite being opposites in many ways, they share a certain similarity.
Suddenly, the two of them fall deep into the underground of the academy and get caught up in the games of the hidden world beneath Yuunagi Academy, Yomosugara Academy!!
In a school where an eternal night reigns, the games are played in pairs, and the rewards are the mysteries of this world and their own past memories!!
Will they be able to uncover the truth of this world—?
A survival game school suspense where “memory” and “trust” are the key!

(Source: Comic Walker, edited)
description.ja: エリート校の夕凪学園の落ちこぼれ・東雲夕夜。同じくぼっちでありながら、学年成績トップの日嗣アカリ。どこか似た者同士な二人は突如として、夕凪学園の裏側の世界・終夜学園のデスゲームに巻き込まれていく…!!

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

title.en: The Yellow-haired Villain in Female Main Character's Novel wants Happiness

altTitles.en: The yellow-haired villain in Soaring Phoenix's novels also desires happiness

altTitles.zh: 凤傲天小说里的黄毛反派也想幸福

description.en:
[From the Same Studio as the Manhua "Shut Up, Evil Dragon!"]

Transmigrating into the body of a yellow-haired villain in the early stages of a Yuri novel, Moon only wants to survive. But… why does the story seem to be going off track?

The princess has already been drugged, and even her pants have been removed—so why hasn't the protagonist appeared yet? Why does the protagonist’s childhood friend, a noble and pure saint, keep giving me flirtatious looks? Even my obedient and loyal personal maid has started gazing at me with increasingly dangerous eyes!

Where is the protagonist?! Please, someone save me!!

altTitles.th: ท่านพ่อไร้เทียมทาน

description.en:
Noh Gajang is a strong, dedicated, and humble man, with much respect for the martial arts. But after the death of his lovely wife, this muscle-for-hire just wants an easy job that allows him to be a good father to his three little babies. He’s even happy to pull guard duty and fend off amateur fighters if it means he can return home safely each night. 

But when a creepy cult starts stealing children from the city, Gajang must step up to the challenge and discover his true warrior potential.

하늘의 뜻을 아니, 그 누가 아비父에 견주리오! 
고아로 떠돌다 운 좋게 스승을 만나 특급 해결사로 이름을 날리던 노가장.
사랑하는 여인을 만나 이름대로 가장家長이 된다는 기쁨도 잠시, 하루아침에 핏덩이 세쌍둥이를 홀로 키워야 하는 신세가 되었다. 아비는 그 어떤 경우라도 제 새끼의 입에 먹을 걸 넣어 줘야 하는 존재인 법! 노가장은 위험천만한 낭인 생활을 때려치우고 천룡회 갑급 무사가 되어  자식새끼들 잘 먹이고 입히고자 한다. 하지만 억지로 나간 출장 임무는 목숨이 위험하기만 하고 그 사이 사방에선 그의 아이들을 눈독 들이기 시작하는데…… 기다려라, 내 새끼들아! 여기 아비가 간다! 
아버지, 노가장의 좌충우돌 무협 액션&육아 일지!

description.pt:
Noh Ga Jang teve a vida de um guerreiro desde que ele tem memória, isolado do mundo e analfabeto, até conhecer uma mulher bonita que rouba seu coração. Ele se casa com ela e vive uma vida de folia, e ela fica grávida dos seus filhos. Inesperadamente, ela morre durante o parto, deixando o Noh apenas com seus trigêmeos recém-nascidos. Desesperado, triste, mas não quebrado, Noh proclama aos céus que ele se tornará um homem exemplar para criar os tesouros inestimáveis que sua esposa o deixou.  
  
Vamos testemunhar o guerreiro implacável Noh se tornando um pai incomparável, percebendo o quão poderoso ele pode ser pelo bem dos seus filhos.

История бесподобного отца, которому известна воля небес. Автор Но Гён Чхан широко известен по манхве Красная Буря, но если вам нужна другая причина для чтения, то это удивительная история приключений мастера боевых искусств, включающая свадьбу, заботы отца и битвы. Она во многом похожа на Красную Бурю: крутой мастер, главный герой, беспокоящийся о своей семье, трагическая предыстория. Обязательно к прочтению для каждого, кому понравилась Красная Буря.

altTitles.ja: 鎧塚さんをバブらせたい

description.en: Kurumi is a shy and easily embarrassed high school girl with a strong imagination. Her girlfriend is a cool, iron-faced office worker, Ms. Yoroizuka, who doesn't show much emotion. In order to get the older woman to indulge in her, Kurumi tries all sorts of things to spoil Ms. Yoroizuka, but...?

altTitles.es: El esclavo de la élite de soldados de Mato

altTitles.en: Slave of the Magic Capital's Elite Troops

altTitles.vi: Nô lệ của đội tinh nhuệ Ma đô

description.en:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
description.fr:
La dimension démoniaque connue sous le nom de "Mato" s'est ouverte pour menacer l'humanité, et une sorte de "pêcher" qui y pousse donne des fruits qui confèrent des pouvoirs spéciaux à ceux qui les mangent, donnant à l'humanité une chance de se battre, mais cela ne fonctionne que pour les femmes. Ainsi, en tant que protectrices de l'humanité, les femmes gagnent en statut social tandis que les hommes sont relégués à des citoyens de seconde zone qui se battent pour une occupation et une reconnaissance de base.  
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, une lycéenne rusée et laborieuse dont la sœur aînée a été enlevée lors d'un événement du Mato 5 ans auparavant ; alors qu'elle se lamente sur les difficultés de la vie qui l'attend, un événement s'ouvre devant elle, et alors qu'elle est sauvée des démons par le capitaine Kyouka du Corps Anti-Démon, elle lui confère ses pouvoirs d'"esclave" et le transforme en un puissant monticule animal qui fauche les démons.  
  
Cependant, il y a un prix surprenant à payer pour être son "esclave"… et ce n'est pas lui qui doit le payer.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/takemura4hey/)
description.ru:
Эта боевая фентезийная манга повествует о нескольких героинях, что защищают людей в альтернативном пространстве, именуемом Мато (Город Демонов).  


---
description.vi:
Chiều không gian đầy quỷ dữ được gọi là "Ma đô" đã mở ra đe dọa đối với loài người. Tại đó, có một loài  "đào" ban cho kẻ ăn sức mạnh đặc biệt, giúp nhân loại có cơ hội chiến đấu, tuy nhiên, chỉ có nữ giới mới có thể sử dụng thứ sức mạnh "trái đào" ấy. Bởi vậy mà phụ nữ trở thành những người bảo vệ loài người, địa vị xã hội tăng cao, trong khi nam giới bị giáng xuống tầng lớp công dân hạng hai, giành giật nhau những công việc cơ bản và sự thừa nhận.

Nhân vật chính Yuuki Wakura, một nam sinh chăm chỉ yêu nội trợ, chị gái cậu đã bị bắt trong một sự kiện của Ma đô 5 năm về trước. Khi đang than thở về những khó khăn gặp phải, cậu đã bị lũ quỷ tấn công. Nhờ được đội trưởng Kyouka của Đội chống Quỷ kịp thời ứng cứu, cậu chấp nhận trở thành "nô lệ" của cô để có thể sở hữu sức mạnh tiêu diệt bầy quỷ.

Bất ngờ thay, việc làm "nô lệ" đòi hỏi một cái giá tương xứng...và người phải trả giá lại không phải là cậu.
description.pt-br:
A dimensão cheia de demônios conhecida como "Mato" se abriu para ameaçar a humanidade, e uma espécie de "pessegueiro" que ali cresce produz frutos que conferem poderes especiais a quem os come, dando à humanidade uma chance de lutar, mas isso só funciona para mulheres. Como tal, como protetoras da humanidade, as mulheres ascendem no estatuto social, enquanto os homens são relegados a cidadãos de segunda classe, em busca de uma ocupação básica e de reconhecimento.

 Yuuki Wakura é um estudante do último ano do ensino médio, astuto e trabalhoso, cuja irmã mais velha foi raptada durante um evento em Mato, 5 anos antes; enquanto lamenta as dificuldades da vida que tem pela frente, um evento se abre diante dele, e ao ser resgatado dos demônios pela Capitã Kyouka do Corpo Anti-Demônio, ela confere a ele poderes como seu "escravo" e o transforma em uma poderosa montaria bestial. que destrói os demônios.

No entanto, há um preço surpreendente a pagar por ele ser seu “escravo”… e não é ele quem tem que pagar.

description.en:
I thought I could keep moving forward, but in an unexpected instant, I’ve lost myself in the gaps of this vast universe. Where have I seen this, this landscape that doesn’t exist? Right over there, in a time that will never come to pass. Welcome to the world of panpanya.    The 22 chapters of Makura Uo, which include stories like Ame no Hi (Rainy Day) and Gomi no Sakebigoe (The Cries of Trash), were either serialized in the special web edition of Hakusensha’s Rakuen Le Paradis magazine or published as doujinshi. Included are entries from panpanya’s diary as well as annotations from the author herself.    

(Source: AniList)
description.ru: Странные будни странной девочки в странном городе, полном странных созданий.

title.en: Beastmaster: I can see the complete encyclopedia of evolution

altTitles.zh: 御兽：我能看见进化全图鉴

description.en: An awakening in a desperate situation, Li Wenxuan, an ordinary college student, was pushed into the era of fantasy beast masters by fate. Starting from the lowest level fantasy beast, he groped forward in revenge and protection, pursuing his own power and beliefs. This is a golden age where fantasy beasts and humans coexist, and Li Wenxuan is destined to embark on a unique path of rise.

title.en: I Won't Let Mistress Suck My Blood

altTitles.ja: ご主人様には吸わせません！

description.en: Matilda is looking for a job and a place to stay, and ends up in a large mansion known as the "Haunted House." The owner of the house, August, is a beautiful, soft-spoken woman, and Matilda is attracted to her and decides to work for her as a maid. However, that night, Matilda finds that her master has transformed.
description.id: Matilda mencari pekerjaan dan tempat tinggal, dan berakhir di sebuah rumah besar yang dikenal sebagai “Mansion Berhantu”. Pemilik rumah, August, adalah seorang wanita cantik yang bersuara lembut, dan Matilda tertarik padanya dan memutuskan untuk bekerja untuknya sebagai pembantu. Namun, pada malam itu, Matilda mendapati bahwa majikannya telah berubah.

description.en: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
description.id: Setelah menyelamatkan Bumi, para alien tinggal bersama manusia di Jepang. Nomamoto, seorang pekerja pabrik dengan bos alien yang kejam, suatu hari bertemu dengan Kitami, yang mengatakan bahwa keluarganya sendiri dibunuh oleh alien. Keduanya dengan cepat menjalin persahabatan, tetapi suatu hari Kitami melakukan hal yang tidak terpikirkan...
description.ja: <毎週月曜更新>宇宙人が地球を救ってから、人間と宇宙人が共に住むようになった日本。工場で宇宙人の上司にこき使われるノマモトは、家族を宇宙人に殺されたという北見と出会う。仲を深める2人だが、ある日北見がとんでもないことをしてしまい…
description.ru: Пришельцы спасли Землю и обосновались с людьми в Японии. Номамото, работающая на фабрике с отвратительным боссом-пришельцем, однажды встречает Китами, который рассказывает ей, что семью его убили пришельцы. Между ними быстро возникает дружба, но однажды Китами совершает немыслимое...
description.uk: Після порятунку Землі прибульцями, Японія стала спільним домом для них та людей. Номото, яка змушена терпіти знущання від свого боса-прибульця на заводі, зустрічає Кітамі, чиє серце розбите втратою сім'ї, вбитої прибульцями. Між ними виникає щира дружба, яка переходить до здійснення їх бажань... винищення всіх прибульців...
description.pt-br: Após salvar a Terra, os alienígenas passaram a viver com os humanos no Japão. Nomamoto, uma operária de fábrica com um chefe alienígena abusivo, um dia conhece Kitami, que conta que sua própria família foi morta por alienígenas. Os dois rapidamente formam uma amizade, mas um dia Kitami faz o impensável…

title.en: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.en: A Story About a Senior Who Annoys His Junior
A Story About a Senpai Who Annoys His Kouhai

altTitles.ja-ro: Senpai ga Urusai Kouhai no Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

altTitles.vi: Lão Senpai phiền phức của tôi

description.en:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

description.ja:
ちょっぴりガサツだけど面倒見のいい先輩・武田と、そんな彼に素直になれない（？）後輩・五十嵐。

今日も五十嵐は武田をうざいと思いつつ、本当はまんざらでもなかったりやっぱり本当にうざいときもあったりと自覚のない二人の微妙な距離感にもだえちゃうことまちがいなし！
description.uk: Іґараші - працьовита молода офісна жінка. Такеда - семпай з роботи, нервує її постійно - і все ж вона стає все ближче до нього. Кожен день наповнений комічними невдачами та романтичними моментами, коли Іґараші намагається збалансувати роботу, життя та кохання.
description.pt-br: Igarashi é uma jovem esforçada que trabalha em um escritório. Takeda, o senpai acima dela no trabalho, a irrita constantemente - e ainda assim ela se encontra cada vez mais próxima dele. Todos os dias são repletos de contratempos cômicos e momentos românticos enquanto Igarashi tenta equilibrar trabalho, vida e amor.

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---

- Adapted into a Live Action film in 2016. Link to the [ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=24660) Page
description.pl:
Hideo Suzuki to 35­‑latek pracujący jako asystent znanego twórcy mang. Na pozór wydaje się zwyczajnym człowiekiem, balansuje jednak na granicy choroby psychicznej, ma olbrzymie problemy z funkcjonowaniem w społeczeństwie i kontaktach z innymi ludźmi. Jak ktoś taki poradzi sobie w świecie opanowywanym przez zombie?  
 Mangę charakteryzuje bardzo poważne podejście do tematu i zorientowanie na psychikę bohatera oraz analizę ludzkiej osobowości.  
 Yumi - 25 maja 2011
description.vi:
Như các bạn đã từng biết là trong các bộ truyện kinh dị đa số các nhân vật chính đều rất mạnh mẽ đẹp trai, phong độ và được nhiều gái theo v…v…! Nhưng đó là trong mấy truyện zombie bình thường thôi!
Trong bộ I am a hero này thì main của chúng ta lại là một thằng bất tài vô dụng, bị chính bạn gái của mình sau khi biến thành zombie cắn, cậu ta chỉ biết chạy chạy và chạy… 

Sau đó trải qua nhiều biến cố thì main đã trưởng thành và ra dáng đàn ông hơn trước....
 Đây là một bộ truyện hay mang hơi hướng kinh dị, giật gân, tâm lý,...
description.pt-br: Hideo Suzuki é um assistente de mangaká de 35 anos de idade lutando para ser um herói em sua própria vida, dividido pelo trabalho na série em que é assistente "lime light" e com uma série nova ao mesmo tempo, equilibrando seu relacionamento com sua namorada e seus próprios delírios. No entanto, tão difícil como Hideo pode imaginar, o mundo parece ter um conjunto de planos diferentes para ele; maquinações sinistras e obscuras que derrubam completamente a sua realidade e como ele a vê.

altTitles.en: The Legend of the President's Glasses

description.en:
A collection of short stories, centered around the theme of journey.

Table of Contents
Chapter 1: Harukoma
Chapter 2: The Pine Tree Occasionally Awakens
Chapter 3: Traveling Prince
Chapter 4: Six Months' Vacation
Chapter 5: The Girl Underwater
Chapter 6: How to Wake Up Your Lady
Chapter 7: The Legend of the President's Glasses
Chapter 8: Eru's House Sitting
Chapter 9: Family Ensemble
Chapter 10: Tazaki in the Desert
Chapter 11: Taro and Tayura
Chapter 12: Ran and the Gray World Extra
Chapter 13: Toki's Journey
Appendix
Afterword
This museum's treasured collection is a slew of strange comics!
description.zh: 这个博物馆，珍藏着许多奇怪的漫画！

description.en:
University student Kang Ji-ho, accidentally saw Seon Woo-hui's breasts at a drinking party, and avoids her because she couldn't resist the desire to see them again. 

"Just give it to me straight. Why are you avoiding me?" 
“…If I tell you straight up, won’t you get angry?” 
"No. If you don't tell me, I'll kill you." 

I-I mean...

“When I look at you… I keep wanting to see your boobs…” 

At first, she thought it was a joke. But when she realized it wasn’t, Woo-hui decided to pull a mean prank. 

"Shall I show you my boobs?" 
“…Do you want to touch it?”
Exploring different concepts, Variant is a short manga serialized in Monthly Magazine Garo between 1992 and 1994 but was never collected.

title.en: Isekai Yurutto Survival Seikatsu ~Gakkou no Minna to Isekai no Mujintou ni Tenishitakedo Ore Dake Rakushou desu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界ゆるっとサバイバル生活 ～学校の皆と異世界の無人島に転移したけど俺だけ楽勝です～

altTitles.en: Survival Life in a Different World: I Moved to an Uninhabited Island in a Different World With Everyone at School, but I’m the Only One Who Wins Easily

altTitles.ko: 이세계 느긋 서바이벌 생활 ~학교 모두와 이세계의 무인도로 전이했지만 나만 낙승입니다~

altTitles.zh: 异世界悠闲荒野求生～和学校的众人一起传送到了无人岛但是只有我游刃有余～

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界悠閒荒野求生~和學校的眾人一起傳送到了無人島但是僅自己遊刃有餘~

description.en:
I’m Shinomiya Hokage, a 3rd-year high-school boy who dreams of a survival life. One day, everyone in my school transferred to a mysterious island in a parallel world. I woke up in an unknown cave and I started moving on my own. Then, I met up with some of my classmates. My knowledge and tools in survival shines through. I was a plain guy in school but I’m the leader in this world.  
  


---
description.es:
Soy Shinomiya Hokage, un chico de tercer año de preparatoria que sueña con una vida de supervivencia. Un día, todos en mi escuela se trasladaron a una isla misteriosa en un mundo paralelo. Me desperté en una cueva desconocida y empecé a moverme por mi cuenta. Entonces, me encontré con algunos de mis compañeros de clase. Mis conocimientos y herramientas de supervivencia destacan. Yo era un chico sencillo en la escuela, pero soy el líder en este mundo.  
  


---
description.ja:
無人島暮らしを夢見る高校生、篠宮火影(しのみや ほかげ)は、クラスメートとともに異世界にある謎の島に転移する。
電気もガスも水道もない無人島で、火影は持ち前のサバイバル能力によって次々に問題を解決する。
嵐に見舞われても、虎に拠点を占領されても、火影が止まることはない。
卓越した知識と経験でゼロから文明を築く、ちょっぴりエッチな本格異世界サバイバルコメディ。
description.pt:
Eu sou Shinomiya Hokage, um garoto do terceiro ano do ensino médio que sonha com uma vida de sobrevivência. Um dia, todos na minha escola foram transferidos para uma ilha misteriosa em um mundo paralelo. Acordei em uma caverna desconhecida e comecei a explorar sozinho. Então, encontrei algumas das minhas colegas. Meu conhecimento e ferramentas de sobrevivência se destacam. Eu era um menino simples na escola, mas sou o líder neste mundo.  
  


---

**Monthly serialization / Serialización mensual.**  
  
- [Alternative Raw Source](https://rawmangas.net/manga/isekai-yurutto-survival-seikatsu-gakkou-no-minna-to-isekai-no-mujintou-ni-tenishitakedo-ore-dake-rakushou-desu-manga-raw/)
description.pt-br: Eu sou Shinomiya Hokage, um garoto do terceiro ano do ensino médio que sonha com uma vida de sobrevivência. Um dia, todos na minha escola foram transferidos para uma ilha misteriosa em um mundo paralelo. Acordei em uma caverna desconhecida e comecei a explorar sozinho. Então, encontrei algumas das minhas colegas. Meu conhecimento e ferramentas de sobrevivência se destacam. Eu era um menino simples na escola, mas sou o líder neste mundo.

altTitles.ja: 星野ヒバナはみつがれる

description.en: Hoshino Hika (25 years old). Unemployed, but moderately enjoying life. What makes this possible is her overwhelming 'ability to be pampered.' She possesses a mysterious charm that captivates certain people, allowing her to sustain her lifestyle with the support of those around her. What is her everyday life like, living outside the framework of 'market logic'—the exchange of money for goods?

altTitles.en: Witches Bloom Under the Full Moon

description.en: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
description.ja: 帆高航一（ほたか　こういち）はちょっとコジラセ気味な中学2年生。そんな彼はある日、「アルストロメリアの魔女」を名乗る謎の少女・紫麻（しま）と出会い、彼女の“契約者”に選ばれる。満月の夜を舞台に繰り広げられる、恋と魔法のファンタジー！
description.zh: 帆高航一是个有点内向的初二学生。某一天，他遇到了一个神秘的女孩紫麻，她自称“阿尔斯特罗梅里亚的女巫”，并被选为她的“契约者”。 在满月之夜缔结的爱情和魔法的幻想故事！

description.en: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
description.ja: 東條高校サッカー部に所属する嵐木八咫郎（あらきやたろう）の夢は欧州を制覇し、世界一になること。 高校3年の最後の試合、夢への第1歩、プロ入りを目指しスカウトの目に留まるため奮闘をするが―…。
description.vi: Yataro Araki là thành viên clb bóng đá trường cao trung Tojo. Cậu có ước mơ chinh phục đỉnh cao bóng đá Châu Âu trong 10 năm tới. Thời gian trôi qua, vào trận cuối cùng trước khi tốt nghiệp, và cũng là trận sẽ quyết định giấc mơ của cậu. Mọi thứ sẽ vô nghĩa nếu Araki không được tuyển trạch viên nào để ý đến, vì vậy cậu sẵn lòng làm tất cả mọi thứ, kể cả khi phải chơi bẩn để giành lấy chiến thắng. Nếu nó giúp cậu vươn đến đỉnh cao! Chào mừng đến với giới bóng đá quốc tế! Không tồn tại thứ gọi là bất khả xâm phạm hay luật lệ! Ít nhất là khi chiến thắng đang cận kề!

description.en:
Welcome to the World of "Ave Mujica"――. 

This comic is the official comic adaptation of TV anime "BanG Dream! Ave Mujica".“Give me the rest of your life?”

(From Comic Growl)
description.ja:
…ようこそ。Ave Mujicaの世界へ。

次世代ガールズバンドプロジェクト『BanG Dream!』より「Ave Mujica」をコミカライズ！ 

過去も素顔も仮面で覆い隠し、今宵も完璧な箱庭に降り立つ。
description.zh:
…欢迎来到 Ave Mujica 的世界。

该漫画是TV动画《BanG Dream!Ave Mujica》的官方漫画改编！ 「给我你的余生？」

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja-ro: Hana no Keiji -Kumo no Kanata ni-

altTitles.ja: 花の慶次 -雲のかなたに-

description.en: During the closing years of the civil war period and uneasy reign of Toyotomi Hideyoshi, when men high and low scramble to follow conventional propriety so that they don't attract undue notice (or death) to themselves, there is one very bizarre individual who is known for his legendarily outlandish and wild personality, physical appearance and behavior. This series traces the dramatic adventures of Keiji Maeda from personal conflicts with his adopted Maeda family, brave combat exploits, travels to the capital, and relationships with famous existing figures such as Iyeyasu Tokugawa, Rikyuu the tea master, and Hideyoshi himself, to experiences with the foreign and Japanese Christian faithful.

The weakest monster (slime) who longed to be human is reincarnated as a saint, but with the worst character of all, a villainous noble girl. From the lowest status, hated and resented; an existence where she will be terminated immediately if her true identity as a slime is discovered, she will become a beloved saint in order to live a safe and secure life!
description.ja: 人間に憧れた最弱魔物（スライム）が乗っ取ったのは、聖女だけど性格最悪な極悪令嬢・ジェリィの体だった！　折角人間に成ることが出来たのに、周りの人間たちから恨まれ嫌われているうえに、魔物（スライム）とバレたら即終了のバッドエンドまっしぐら…!?
description.ru: Самый слабый монстр (слайм), мечтающий стать человеком, вселяется в тело злодейки с ужасной репутацией! Если будет раскрыта её истинная сущность, то она будет немедленно уничтожена, поэтому она будет стремиться стать всеми любимой, чтобы жить безопасной и комфортной жизнью!

description.en:
A special edition/side story of the popular series "Namaikizakari." (Cheeky Brat) featuring the couple Tono-kun and Ami-chan! They've been dating for a year, but they still haven't progressed beyond kissing. What will become of their "first time"?! This collection of short stories also includes the elusive first one-shot version of "Namaikizakari".
The volume contains several stories.

 - Pinkstrap
- After School Aurora I 
- After School Aurora II
- Bonus Chapter 1
- Bonus Chapter 2

Manaka Saki, a popular high school student, falls in love at first sight with her Chemistry teacher, Tsuge Kousuke, after being saved from insistent upperclassmen suitors. Tsuke-sensei is popular amongst the students as a teacher and a handsome man. Manaka starts pursuing Tsusge-sensei until she finally becomes his secret girlfriend. There is only one condition: both of them have promised not to touch each other until she graduates.
Will they be able to keep their promise?
This story is included in the "Pinkscrap" volume.
description.es:
Spanish:  
Un secreto al otro lado de la cortina…  
Manaka hizo una promesa con su novio la cual consiste en no tocarse hasta después de la graduación, el nombre su novio es Tsuge Kousuke, el profesor de Qu� mica de su grupo.
